author: pipermerriam
content: For the uTP protocol, I think the thing we need to try and measure or calculate is: 1) bandwidth overhead  and 2) overall throughput.  Ideally we could compare these to libp2p as our baseline.

author: sky.cactus
content: 1M is a pretty big/optimistic number I feel like, but perhaps I'm just a pessimist.

author: nishant0
content: Is there a canonical source that references the latest information/research on historical state retrieval ?

author: pipermerriam
content: <@!476250636548308992> can you define "historical state retrieval" a bit more, not clear what you mean.  (Here is a glossary of terminology if it helps: https://github.com/ethereum/stateless-ethereum-specs/wiki/Glossary)

author: nishant0
content: Ah in terms of the glossary it would be Chain History

author: nishant0
content: Ah k thanks, I think that repo was what i was looking for
